channel.title: Websites Access Denied
channel.description:
some websites not accessable through Tor.whonix <iam using latest Version> Here are samle of errrors # Access Denied
You don't have permission to access "xxx//xxxxxxxx" on this server.
Reference #18.94ee2117.1649412433.9c3816f
Error 462 Not allowed.
Not allowed.
### Guru Mediation:
Details: cache-hhn4077-HHN 1649413288 2416489379
Varnish cache server
The Same Websites however are accesable using (TOR*Windows), I know there are huge differences reg. Secutity levels, that why i want to stay on Tor Whonix.
thankfull for suggestions to fix this.

item.title: Websites Access Denied
item.dc:creator: Patrick
item.description:
See:
Bypass Tor Censorship

INT22:

The Same Websites however are accesable using (TOR*Windows)

That is very most likely just good/bad luck due to use of different Tor exit relays. Some are blacklisted. Some are not. If you use New Identity Function often enough, it’s probably the same behavior.

Read full topic
